Esta medicina ancestral revive a todos los Pokémon debilitados al usarse en combate. Úsala en momentos difíciles.

Estas piedras raras pueden hacer evolucionar a cualquier Pokémon, sin importar su nivel o método de evolución. ¡Úsalas con sabiduría!

Set a new BST range for Wild Pokémon
Establecer un nuevo rango de BST para Pokémon salvajes
The stats range for wild Pokémon is \V[197]
El rango de estadísticas para Pokémon salvajes es \V[197]
\C[6]Warning: the BST range is set at \V[197], which means that wild Pokémon will only be replaced by other Pokémon with their exact base stats total.
\C[6]Advertencia: el rango de BST está establecido en \V[197], lo que significa que los Pokémon salvajes solo serán reemplazados por otros Pokémon con su total exacto de estadísticas base.
\C[6]Increase the BST range if you want more variety. The recommended range is between 5 and 30.
\C[6]Aumenta el rango de BST si quieres más variedad. El rango recomendado está entre 5 y 30.
The wild Pokémon have been shuffled.
Los Pokémon salvajes han sido mezclados.

Hello, I'm the Help Man. Is there anything I can help you with?

\C[2]Warning: Opening this menu will flag your save file as a Randomized playthough, which will lock you out of certain events and rewards.

Single Species mode is now \C[2]Disabled
El modo Especie Única ahora está \C[2]Desactivado
Single Species mode is currently \C[2]Disabled
El modo Especie Única está actualmente \C[2]Desactivado
Turn off Reversed mode?
¿Apagar modo Invertido?
Reversed mode is now disabled.
El modo Invertido ahora está desactivado.
Turn on Reversed mode?
¿Activar modo Invertido?
Reversed mode is now enabled.
El modo Invertido ahora está activado.
In reversed mode all the fusions used by trainers are flipped.
En el modo invertido, todas las fusiones usadas por los entrenadores están invertidas.
So if a trainer normally has a Pikachu(Head)/Bubasaur (Body) fusion in normal mode, it will have a Bulbasaur (Head)/Pikachu(Body) fusion in Reversed Mode.
Así que si un entrenador normalmente tiene una fusión Pikachu (Cabeza)/Bulbasaur (Cuerpo) en modo normal, tendrá Bulbasaur (Cabeza)/Pikachu (Cuerpo) en modo invertido.
You cannot use this option while trainers are randomized.
No puedes usar esta opción mientras los entrenadores están aleatorizados.
NPC trainers level up their Pokémon the more you battle them.
Los entrenadores NPC suben de nivel a sus Pokémon cuanto más luchas contra ellos.
Would you like to reset all the trainers rematches? This cannot be undone.
¿Quieres restablecer todos los combates repetidos con entrenadores? Esto no se puede deshacer.
The trainers rematch hashmap was resetted.
La lista de combates repetidos con entrenadores fue restablecida.
If you've been experiencing issues with the game, the first thing to do should be to make sure that you are playing on the most recent version of the game.
Si has tenido problemas con el juego, lo primero que debes hacer es asegurarte de que estás jugando en la versión más reciente.
Oftentimes, the issues that you're experiencing will have already been fixed in a newer update.
Muchas veces, los problemas que experimentas ya se han solucionado en una actualización más nueva.
You can download the most recent version on the game's Pokecommunity page.
Puedes descargar la versión más reciente en la página del juego en Pokecommunity.
If you already made sure that you are on the most recent version of the game and the issue persists, I can try and reset some of the game's parameters to see if it fixes it.
Si ya te has asegurado de que tienes la versión más reciente del juego y el problema persiste, puedo intentar restablecer algunos de los parámetros del juego para ver si se soluciona.
However, this could potentially have some unintended consequences. Would you like to proceed?
Sin embargo, esto podría tener consecuencias no deseadas. ¿Quieres continuar?
Hopefully this helps!
¡Espero que esto ayude!
If you have been experiencing frequent errors, please report them to the Discord, along with the error message and your game's version number.
Si has experimentado errores frecuentes, por favor repórtalos en el Discord, junto con el mensaje de error y la versión de tu juego.

I wouldn't give this to you if I did not trust you completely, but please be very cautious with it.

You seem like a very mean person. You have a lot of anger in your heart.
Pareces una persona muy mala. Tienes mucha ira en tu corazón.
You don't strike me as a particularly good person...
No pareces una persona especialmente buena...
You strike me as someone who can be a bit mean-spirited sometimes, but still generally well-intentioned.
Pareces alguien que a veces puede ser un poco mala, pero en general con buenas intenciones.
You strike me as a very neutral person. Neither good, nor bad.
Me das la impresión de ser alguien bastante neutral. Ni especialmente bueno, ni malo.
You seem like you're very pure of heart and always willing to help the ones in need.
Pareces alguien muy puro de corazón y siempre dispuesto a ayudar a quienes lo necesitan.
You strike me as someone who tries its earnest to always do the right thing.
Pareces alguien que se esfuerza sinceramente por hacer lo correcto siempre.
You strike me as someone who generally tries to do the right thing, but you could also do a bit more.
Pareces alguien que generalmente trata de hacer lo correcto, pero podría hacer un poco más.
You strike me as someone who generally tries to do the right thing, but your heart isn't completely pure either.
Pareces alguien que generalmente trata de hacer lo correcto, pero tu corazón tampoco es completamente puro.

Esparce bondad a tu alrededor y el universo te corresponderá con bondad.

¡Pero mira quien es! El nuevo Campeón de la Liga Pokémon. Bienvenido a casa \PN, me alegra verte de nuevo.
Everyone in the Pokémon scientific community is very impressed by your achievement.
Toda la comunidad científica Pokémon está muy impresionada por tu logro.
I have been talking with my colleague from the Johto region, professor Elm and told me that he wanted to give you a Pokémon to commemorate your victory.
He estado hablando con mi colega de la región Johto, el profesor Elm, y me dijo que quería darte un Pokémon para conmemorar tu victoria.
He also mentionned something else...
También mencionó algo más...
A long time ago, scientists from Cinnabar Island engineered a Pokémon more powerful than any others.
Hace mucho tiempo, los científicos de la Isla Cinnabar crearon un Pokémon más poderoso que cualquiera.
But they failed to curb its vicious tendencies and one day, it fled the mansion and hasn't been seen ever since.
Pero no pudieron controlar sus tendencias agresivas y un día escapó de la mansión y no se ha visto desde entonces.
Recently, my colleague Professor Elm in Johto came across some new information concerning this rare Pokémon's whereabouts.
Recientemente, mi colega, el profesor Elm en Johto, encontró información nueva sobre el paradero de este raro Pokémon.
He says he'd need the assistance of a strong trainer, so I thought you'd be the perfect candidate.
Dice que necesitaría la ayuda de un entrenador fuerte, así que pensé que serías el candidato perfecto.
His lab is located in New Bark Town in the Johto region. It's a long way from here, but do you think you could pay him a visit?
Su laboratorio está en Pueblo Primavera, en la región de Johto. Está bastante lejos de aquí, pero ¿crees que podrías ir a visitarlo?
Please! Professor Elm would greatly benefit from the field experience of a powerful trainer like yourself.
Te lo suplico, ¡el Profesor Elm aprovecharía mucho la experiencia de un entrenador con tu nivel!
Won't you please reconsider?
¿Lo podrías reconsiderar, por favor?
Great! Then it's settled. Go meet my colleague Professor Elm in New Bark Town.
¡Genial! Entonces está decidido. Ve a ver a mi colega, el profesor Elm, en Pueblo Olivo.
You can get to Johto by taking the train from Saffron City.
Puedes llegar a Johto tomando el tren desde Ciudad Azafrán.
When you're in Goldenrod City, head down South through Azalea Town, and continue until you reach Violet City.
Cuando estés en Ciudad Trigal, ve hacia el sur pasando por Pueblo Azalea y continúa hasta llegar a Ciudad Violeta.
From there, it should be a straight path to New Bark Town!
Desde ahí, debería ser un camino directo a Pueblo Olivo.
Professor Elm will give you further instructions when you meet him. Good luck!
El profesor Elm te dará más instrucciones cuando lo encuentres. ¡Buena suerte!
Select the randomization type for wild Pokémon.
Selecciona el tipo de aleatorización para Pokémon salvajes.
Randomize legendaries and static encounters?
¿Aleatorizar legendarios y encuentros estáticos?
Randomize regular Pokémon to fusions?
¿Aleatorizar Pokémon regulares a fusiones?
Choose randomness degree (Wild Pokémon) \ch[1,10,More info,Balanced, Moderate, Insane,Custom]
Elige el grado de aleatoriedad (Pokémon salvajes) \ch[1,10,Más info,Equilibrado,Moderado,Insano,Personalizado]
The Pokémon get shuffled according to their base stats.
Los Pokémon se mezclan según sus estadísticas base.
The lower the degree, the more Pokémon will be replaced by other Pokémon with around the same stats.
Mientras menor es el grado, más Pokémon serán reemplazados por otros con estadísticas similares.
The higher it is, the more they get randomized to anything.
Mientras mayor es, más se aleatorizan hacia cualquier Pokémon.
"Balanced" randomizes Pokémon to other Pokémon that have the same stats total. (Harder)
"Balanced" cambia cada Pokémon por otro con el mismo total de estadísticas. (Más difícil)
"Insane" is completely random, so you could end up with legendaries on the first route or with a Magikarp at the Elite Four.
"Insane" es completamente aleatorio, así que podrías ver legendarios en la primera ruta o encontrarte con un Magikarp contra el Alto Mando.
(Easier)\n"Moderate" is somewhere in between. You can also set the base stats range yourself if you so choose.
(Más fácil)\n"Moderate" está en un punto intermedio. También puedes ajustar tú mismo el rango de estadísticas base si lo prefieres.
Generating new wild encounters file. This could take a little while.
Generando nuevo archivo de encuentros salvajes. Esto podría tomar un poco de tiempo.
Encounters succesfully randomized!
¡Encuentros aleatorizados con éxito!
Randomize Trainers?
¿Aleatorizar Entrenadores?
Include Pokémon with no custom sprites?
¿Incluir Pokémon sin sprites personalizados?
The trainers need to be shuffled. Is that OK?
Los entrenadores necesitan ser mezclados. ¿Está bien?

¿Mezclar tipos de gimnasio?
The trainers have not been randomized.
Los entrenadores no han sido aleatorizados.

¿Aleatorizar tipos de gimnasio?

¿Aleatorizar objetos que llevan los entrenadores?
Randomize starters?
¿Aleatorizar Pokémon iniciales?

¿Aleatorizar Pokémon salvajes?

Randomize items?
¿Aleatorizar objetos?
\C[2]While playing with randomized items, it is likely that you will come across unimplemented items. Be wary of items without a sprite.
\C[2]Mientras juegas con objetos aleatorizados, es probable que encuentres objetos no implementados. Ten cuidado con los objetos sin sprite.
Randomize TMs?
¿Aleatorizar MT?
\C[7]Game's difficulty?
\C[7]¿Dificultad del juego?
Easy mode:\n - Makes every Pokémon on your team gain exp like in modern Pokémon games
Easy mode:\n - Hace que todos los Pokémon de tu equipo ganen experiencia, como en los juegos modernos.
Hard mode:\n - NPC trainers are higher level and use better AI\n - NPC trainers have access to healing items\n - Next Pokémon's name is not displayed before switching
Hard mode:\n - Los entrenadores NPC tienen un nivel más alto y usan una IA mejorada\n - Los entrenadores NPC pueden usar objetos de curación\n - El nombre del siguiente Pokémon no se muestra antes de cambiar

¡Aviso a todos los entrenadores! ¡Les traemos este boletín de emergencia!
There have been report of two rare flying Pokémon in the Sevii Islands.
Se han reportado dos raros Pokémon voladores en las Islas Sevii.
The Pokémon are \C[2]Red\C[0] and \C[1]Blue\C[0] coloured and they appear to be constantly on the move.
Los Pokémon son de color \C[2]rojo\C[0] y \C[1]azul\C[0], y parecen estar en constante movimiento.
There have also been reports of strong winds whenever these Pokémon are nearby.
También se han registrado fuertes vientos siempre que estos Pokémon están cerca.

¡Esto concluye nuestro informe especial!

Single species mode is a special mode where you can replace trainer fusions by fusions of a specific species of Pokémon.
El modo de una sola especie es un modo especial donde puedes reemplazar las fusiones de entrenadores por fusiones de una especie específica de Pokémon.
This is more of a "just for fun" mode. It is recommended to go with classic or randomized mode for a serious playthrough.
Este es más un modo de “solo por diversión”. Se recomienda usar el modo clásico o aleatorio para una partida seria.
Should the selected Pokémon always used as the \C[1]head\C[0] of fusions, the \C[1]body\C[0], or decided at \C[1]random\C[0] each time?
¿El Pokémon seleccionado debe usarse siempre como la \C[1]cabeza\C[0] de las fusiones, el \C[1]cuerpo\C[0], o decidirse \C[1]aleatoriamente\C[0] cada vez?

Did you know that this constellation is said to represents growth and harmony in the vastness of the cosmos?
¿Sabías que esta constelación se dice que representa el crecimiento y la armonía en la inmensidad del cosmos?
Legends say that those born under Wartortle's watchful gaze possess resilience and adaptability in their journeys through life.
Las leyendas cuentan que quienes nacen bajo la atenta mirada de Wartortle poseen resistencia y adaptabilidad en sus caminos por la vida.
Its fiery presence in the night sky is said to symbolize courage and loyalty, guiding travelers through the darkness.
Su presencia ígnea en el cielo nocturno simboliza coraje y lealtad, guiando a los viajeros a través de la oscuridad.
Its muscular form signifies strength and determination, inspiring all who gaze upon it to strive for greatness.
Su forma musculosa significa fuerza y determinación, inspirando a todos los que la contemplan a luchar por la grandeza.
With its multitude of stars, this constellation illuminates the heavens with a brilliant, fiery glow.
Con su multitud de estrellas, esta constelación ilumina los cielos con un brillo ardiente y brillante.
Resting beneath the moon's gentle glow, this constellation is said to symbolize power and ambition.
Reposando bajo el suave resplandor de la luna, esta constelación simboliza poder y ambición.
Shimmering in the distant reaches of the night sky, this constellation is said to symbolize grace and tranquility.
Brillando en las lejanas regiones del cielo nocturno, esta constelación simboliza gracia y tranquilidad.
Isolated yet enigmatic, this constellation is said to hold the secrets of the cosmos, reminding us of the wonders that lie beyond.
Aislada pero enigmática, se dice que esta constelación guarda los secretos del cosmos, recordándonos las maravillas que hay más allá.
Which mode would you like to play?
¿Qué modo te gustaría jugar?
\C[1]Classic\C[0] is the default game mode. All of the player teams and encounters are based on the original generation 1 games, but every Pokémon is still available.
\C[1]Clásico\C[0] es el modo de juego por defecto. Todos los equipos de los jugadores y encuentros se basan en los juegos originales de la generación 1, pero todos los Pokémon siguen estando disponibles.
In \C[1]Randomized mode\C[0] all of the trainers, wild encounters and items can be randomized. You'll get to customize exactly how you want everything to be randomized.
En \C[1]modo aleatorio\C[0], todos los entrenadores, encuentros salvajes y objetos pueden ser aleatorizados. Podrás personalizar exactamente cómo quieres que todo sea aleatorizado.
\C[1]Remix mode\C[0] is a special mode made by some members of the community that changes all of the trainer teams and wild encounters to showcase more Pokémon from the newer generations.
\C[1]Modo remix\C[0] es un modo especial creado por algunos miembros de la comunidad que cambia todos los equipos de entrenadores y encuentros salvajes para mostrar más Pokémon de las generaciones más nuevas.
In \C[1]Legendary mode\C[0], every trainer Pokémon gets fused with a legendary Pokémon.
En \C[1]Legendary mode\C[0], cada Pokémon de los entrenadores se fusiona con un Pokémon legendario.
You also start with an egg of every legendary Pokémon in your PC and get a legendary starter.
También comienzas con un huevo de cada Pokémon legendario en tu PC y recibes un inicial legendario.
Which trainers do you want to use as a base for Legendary Mode?
¿Qué entrenadores quieres usar como base para el Modo Legendario?
Legendary Mode modifies the teams of all trainers in the game to add legendaries to them.
El Modo Legendario modifica los equipos de todos los entrenadores del juego para añadirles Pokémon legendarios.
The teams of the trainers that it modifies can either be the ones from Classic Mode or the ones from Remix mode.
Los equipos de los entrenadores que modifica pueden ser los del Modo Clásico o los del Modo Remix.
\C[1]Expert mode\C[0] mode is similar to Classic mode, but it changes all of the trainer teams to make them as challenging as possible. This is for veteran Pokémon trainers only!
El modo \C[1]experto\C[0] es similar al modo clásico, pero cambia todos los equipos de entrenadores para hacerlos lo más desafiantes posible. ¡Este es solo para entrenadores Pokémon veteranos!
\C[2]This game mode is still very much a work-in- progress.Many of the trainer teams may still have issues and are likely to change in the future.
\C[2]Este modo de juego todavía está en desarrollo. Muchos equipos de entrenadores pueden tener problemas y es probable que cambien en el futuro.
Make sure to share you suggestions about this game mode on the game's Discord.
Asegúrate de compartir tus sugerencias sobre este modo de juego en el Discord del juego.

\G¡Muy bien! ¿Qué te gustaría hacer?

\C[2]Tendrás que empezar desde el principio la próxima vez que intentes el desafío de la Isla Pinkan.

\C[2]¿Estás seguro de que quieres irte ahora?
Welcome to Pokémon Infinite Fusion!
¡Bienvenido a Pokémon Infinite Fusion!
Before we get started, could you tell us where you downloaded the game from? (This data will not be collected).
Antes de comenzar, ¿podrías decirnos de dónde descargaste el juego? (Estos datos no serán recopilados).
Perfect! The game's official \C[3]Discord\C[0], the game's official \C[3]subreddit\C[0] and the game's \C[3] Pokecommunity\C[0] thread are the <b>only</b> safe places to download the game.
¡Perfecto! El \C[3]Discord\C[0] oficial del juego, el \C[3]subreddit\C[0] oficial y el hilo en \C[3]Pokecommunity\C[0] son los <b>únicos</b> lugares seguros para descargar el juego.
Pokémon Infinite Fusion does NOT currently have an official website, though this may change in the future.
Pokémon Infinite Fusion actualmente NO tiene un sitio web oficial, aunque esto podría cambiar en el futuro.
There have been multiple websites that reupload the game and pretend to be official websites to steal users information and we feel that it's important to inform the players.
Han existido múltiples sitios web que vuelven a subir el juego y se hacen pasar por oficiales para robar información de los usuarios, y creemos que es importante informar a los jugadores.
Let's get started!
¡Vamos a empezar!
\C[2]<b>IMPORTANT !!!</b>
\C[2]<b>¡¡IMPORTANTE!!!</b>
\C[2]Pokémon Infinite Fusion does NOT currently have an official website, though this may change in the future.
\C[2]Pokémon Infinite Fusion actualmente NO tiene un sitio web oficial, aunque esto podría cambiar en el futuro.
\C[2]There are multiple websites that reupload the game and pretend to be official websites to <b>steal your data and infect your computer</b>.
\C[2]Hay varios sitios que vuelven a subir el juego y se hacen pasar por oficiales para <b>robar tus datos e infectar tu computadora</b>.
Here are the steps you need to take if you want to be safe:
Estos son los pasos que debes seguir para estar seguro:
1. Uninstall the game from your computer, as well as anything else you might have downloaded from the fake website.
1. Desinstala el juego de tu computadora, así como cualquier otro archivo que hayas descargado desde el sitio falso.
2. Run a full virus scan of your computer.
2. Realiza un escaneo completo de virus en tu computadora.
3. Join the game's Discord and redownload the game from there.
3. Únete al Discord oficial del juego y vuelve a descargar el juego desde allí. Repetir
Please also consider reporting the fake website to Google to help us combat scammers and keep the community safe.
Por favor, considera reportar el sitio falso a Google para ayudarnos a combatir a los estafadores y mantener segura a la comunidad.
A link to the game's official Discord will now open in your browser.
Ahora se abrirá un enlace al Discord oficial del juego en tu navegador.

<b>Cerulean Division Mission Brief</b>
<b>INFORME DE MISIÓN - DIVISIÓN CELESTE</b>
Your mission is to grow Team Rocket's ranks and build a roster of strong Pokémon to support \C[1]Operation 3F \C[0].
Tu misión es aumentar las filas del Team Rocket y reclutar Pokémon poderosos para respaldar \C[1]La Operación 3F\C[0].
1. Use Cerulean's Nugget Bridge and other popular spots to find and recruit skilled trainers.
1. Utilizar el Puente Pepita de Ciudad Celeste y zonas concurridas para reclutar entrenadores talentosos.
2. Monitor local trainers to identify strong Pokémon. Focus on targets who are less likely to draw attention from law enforcement.
2. Vigilar entrenadores locales para identificar Pokémon poderosos. Priorizar objetivos discretos que eviten alertar a las autoridades.
Ensure all efforts are carried out effectively and discreetly.
Asegúrense de ejecutar todas las operaciones con eficacia y discreción absoluta.

\C[1]Pokéathlon Showdown\C[0] is modified version of the popular battle simulator Pokémon Showdown.
\C[1]Pokéathlon Showdown\C[0] es una versión modificada del popular simulador de batallas Pokémon Showdown
This special version of Showdown was created by the Pokéathlon team especially for Pokémon Infinite Fusion .
Esta versión especial fue creada por el equipo de Pokéathlon especialmente para Pokémon Infinite Fusion
Unlike regular Showdown, Pokéathlon Showdown allows you to use fused Pokémon to battle against your friends!
A diferencia del Showdown regular, Pokéathlon Showdown te permite usar Pokémon fusionados para batallar contra tus amigos
You can also export you Pokémon Infinite Fusion team and import it directly into Showdown!
También puedes exportar tu equipo de Pokémon Infinite Fusion e importarlo directamente en Showdown
To learn more about it, make sure to check out the official \C[1]Pokémon Infinite Fusion discord\C[0], as well as the \C[1]Pokéathlon discord\C[0].
Para saber más, revisa el \C[1]discord oficial de Pokémon Infinite Fusion\C[0] y también el \C[1]discord de Pokéathlon\C[0]
Your team has been copied to your clipboard!
Tu equipo ha sido copiado al portapapeles
You can import your team into Showdown by clicking on \C[1]"New team"\C[0], and then \C[1]"Import from text or URL"\C[0] in the \C[3]Teambuilder\C[0] tab
Puedes importar tu equipo en Showdown haciendo clic en \C[1]"New team"\C[0] y luego en \C[1]"Import from text or URL"\C[0] en la pestaña \C[3]Teambuilder\C[0]
Hello there! You have to get a Gym badge before you're allowed to make a WonderTrade.
Hola, debes obtener una medalla de gimnasio antes de poder hacer un WonderTrade
Hello there! I can see that you've obtained a Wonder Trade ticket!
Hola, veo que has obtenido un boleto de Wonder Trade
Wonder Trades allow you to trade a Pokémon with a random trainer from around the world!
Wonder Trades te permiten intercambiar un Pokémon con un entrenador aleatorio de todo el mundo
With Premium Tickets, the Pokémon you get are more rare and guaranteed to have a custom sprite!
Con boletos Premium, los Pokémon que recibes son más raros y garantizan un sprite personalizado
You can get more Premium Tickets by defeating Gym Leaders.
Puedes obtener más boletos Premium derrotando a los Líderes de Gimnasio
You can also purchase standard tickets from my colleague, of course.
También puedes comprar boletos estándar con mi colega, claro
Oh, I'm sorry but you don't seem to have any Wonder Trade tickets. You may purchase some with my colleague if you'd like.
Lo siento, pero parece que no tienes boletos de Wonder Trade. Puedes comprarlos con mi colega si quieres
Would you like to make Wonder Trade?
¿Quieres hacer un Wonder Trade?
Which type of Wonder Trade would you like to make?
¿Qué tipo de Wonder Trade quieres hacer?
This will save the game automatically. Is this OK?
Esto guardará el juego automáticamente. ¿Está bien?
See you again!
Nos vemos
I need to prepare the next Wonder Trade. Do you mind waiting a little bit?
Necesito preparar el próximo Wonder Trade. ¿Puedes esperar un poco?

Hola, no puedes hacer más Wonder Trades hasta que obtengas una nueva medalla

As you approach the summit, it appears that the laws of physics start to behave strangely.
Conforme te aproximas a la cima, las leyes físicas parecen actuar de manera anómala.
Time slows down and objects seem to be pulled inwards as if they were about to get sucked into a black hole.
El tiempo se vuelve más lento y las cosas parecen ser empujadas hacia adentro, como si las fuera a engullir un agujero negro.
The scientists say that such a strange phenomenon could only be caused by a significant distortion in spacetime.
Los científicos dicen que un fenómeno tan extraño solo podría deberse a una distorsión importante del espacio-tiempo.
But the patterns are too irregular for it to be from natural causes. It's as if space and time were being deliberately manipulated by something...
Pero los patrones son demasiado irregulares para atribuirlos a causas naturales. Es como si algo estuviera manipulando el espacio y el tiempo deliberadamente...
Of course there's only so much information we can obtain from instrument readings. That's why I came here to check it out in person!
Claro que solo podemos sacar cierta información de las lecturas instrumentales. ¡Por eso vine aquí a comprobarlo en persona!
There are myths in the Sinnoh region that describe two legendary Pokémon that are able to alter the spatial and temporal dimensions respectively.
En la región Sinnoh hay mitos que describen a dos Pokémon legendarios capaces de alterar, respectivamente, las dimensiones espacial y temporal.
But manipulating both time and space at once... That's unheard of!
Pero manipular el tiempo y el espacio a la vez... ¡Eso es inaudito!

Dado que podríamos enfrentarnos a algo poderoso, le pedí a \V[12] que se uniera a mi expedición al Monte Plateado.

[3]
1
Bulbasaur can be seen napping in bright sunlight. There is a seed on its back. By soaking up the sun's rays, the seed grows progressively larger.
Se puede ver a Bulbasaur durmiendo bajo la luz del sol. Tiene una semilla en el lomo y, al absorber los rayos solares, esa semilla crece poco a poco.
2
To support its bulb, Ivysaur's legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.
To support its bulb, Ivysaur's legs grow sturdy. If it spends more time lying in the sunlight, the bud will soon bloom into a large flower.
3
Venusaur's flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.
Venusaur's flower is said to take on vivid colors if it gets plenty of nutrition and sunlight. The flower's aroma soothes the emotions of people.
4
The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.
The flame that burns at the tip of its tail is an indication of its emotions. The flame wavers when Charmander is happy, and blazes when it is enraged.
5
Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.
Without pity, its sharp claws destroy foes. If it encounters a strong enemy, it becomes agitated, and the flame on its tail flares with a bluish white color.
6
A Charizard flies about in search of strong opponents. It breathes intense flames that can melt any material. However, it will never torch a weaker foe.
A Charizard flies about in search of strong opponents. It breathes intense flames that can melt any material. However, it will never torch a weaker foe.
7
Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling Squirtle to swim at high speeds.
Its shell is not just for protection. Its rounded shape and the grooves on its surface minimize resistance in water, enabling Squirtle to swim at high speeds.
8
Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon's toughness in battle.
Its large tail is covered with rich, thick fur that deepens in color with age. The scratches on its shell are evidence of this Pokémon's toughness in battle.
9
The waterspouts that protrude from its shell are highly accurate. Their bullets of water can precisely nail tin cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
The waterspouts that protrude from its shell are highly accurate. Their bullets of water can precisely nail tin cans from a distance of over 160 feet.
10
Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.
Its voracious appetite compels it to devour leaves bigger than itself without hesitation. It releases a terribly strong odor from its antennae.
11
Its shell is as hard as an iron slab. A Metapod does not move very much because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the shell.
Its shell is as hard as an iron slab. A Metapod does not move very much because it is preparing its soft innards for evolution inside the shell.
12
It has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can seek, extract, and carry honey from flowers blooming over six miles away.
It has a superior ability to search for delicious honey from flowers. It can seek, extract, and carry honey from flowers blooming over six miles away.
13
A Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It distinguishes its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
A Weedle has an extremely acute sense of smell. It distinguishes its favorite kinds of leaves from those it dislikes by sniffing with its big red proboscis (nose).
14
It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.
It remains virtually immobile while it clings to a tree. However, on the inside, it busily prepares for evolution. This is evident from how hot its shell becomes.
15
A Beedrill is extremely territorial. For safety reasons, no one should ever approach its nest. If angered, they will attack in a swarm.
A Beedrill is extremely territorial. For safety reasons, no one should ever approach its nest. If angered, they will attack in a swarm.
16
It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
It has an extremely sharp sense of direction. It can unerringly return home to its nest, however far it may be removed from its familiar surroundings.
17
This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
This Pokémon flies around, patrolling its large territory. If its living space is violated, it shows no mercy in thoroughly punishing the foe with its sharp claws.
18
This Pokémon has gorgeous, glossy feathers. Many trainers are so captivated by the beautiful feathers on its head that they choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.
This Pokémon has gorgeous, glossy feathers. Many trainers are so captivated by the beautiful feathers on its head that they choose Pidgeot as their Pokémon.
19
A Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly moves its ears and listens for danger. It will make its nest anywhere.
A Rattata is cautious in the extreme. Even while it is asleep, it constantly moves its ears and listens for danger. It will make its nest anywhere.
20
A Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
A Raticate's sturdy fangs grow steadily. To keep them ground down, it gnaws on rocks and logs. It may even chew on the walls of houses.
21
Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
Its loud cry can be heard over half a mile away. If its high, keening cry is heard echoing all around, it is a sign that they are warning each other of danger.
22
Its long neck and elongated beak are ideal for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves this extended and skinny beak to pluck prey.
Its long neck and elongated beak are ideal for catching prey in soil or water. It deftly moves this extended and skinny beak to pluck prey.
23
An Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to an enemy from any direction with a threat from its upraised head.
An Ekans curls itself up in a spiral while it rests. This position allows it to quickly respond to an enemy from any direction with a threat from its upraised head.
24
This Pokémon has a terrifically strong constricting power. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once it wraps its body around its foe, escaping is impossible.
This Pokémon has a terrifically strong constricting power. It can even flatten steel oil drums. Once it wraps its body around its foe, escaping is impossible.
25
It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks. When it releases pent-up energy in a burst, the electric power is equal to a lightning bolt.
It stores electricity in the electric sacs on its cheeks. When it releases pent-up energy in a burst, the electric power is equal to a lightning bolt.
26
If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.
If it stores too much electricity, its behavior turns aggressive. To avoid this, it occasionally discharges excess energy and calms itself down.
27
When it curls up in a ball, it can make any attack bounce off harmlessly. Its hide has turned tough and solid as a result of living in the desert.
When it curls up in a ball, it can make any attack bounce off harmlessly. Its hide has turned tough and solid as a result of living in the desert.
28
It curls up in a ball to protect itself from enemy attacks. It also curls up to prevent heatstroke during the daytime when temperatures rise sharply.
It curls up in a ball to protect itself from enemy attacks. It also curls up to prevent heatstroke during the daytime when temperatures rise sharply.
29
Its highly toxic barbs are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
Its highly toxic barbs are thought to have developed as protection for this small-bodied Pokémon. When enraged, it releases a horrible toxin from its horn.
30
When it is with its friends or family, its barbs are tucked away to prevent injury. It appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
When it is with its friends or family, its barbs are tucked away to prevent injury. It appears to become nervous if separated from the others.
31
It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles using its tough, scaly body. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
It is adept at sending foes flying with harsh tackles using its tough, scaly body. This Pokémon is at its strongest when it is defending its young.
32
The male Nidoran has developed muscles that freely move its ears in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon's notice.
The male Nidoran has developed muscles that freely move its ears in any direction. Even the slightest sound does not escape this Pokémon's notice.
33
Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
Its horn is harder than a diamond. If it senses a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once, and it challenges the foe with all its might.
34
A Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power capable of toppling a metal transmission tower. Once it goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
A Nidoking's thick tail packs enormously destructive power capable of toppling a metal transmission tower. Once it goes on a rampage, there is no stopping it.
35
On every night of a full moon, they come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy go to sleep nestled up against each other in deep and quiet mountains.
On every night of a full moon, they come out to play. When dawn arrives, the tired Clefairy go to sleep nestled up against each other in deep and quiet mountains.
36
A Clefable uses its wings to skip lightly as if it were flying. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. On quiet, moonlit nights, it strolls on lakes.
A Clefable uses its wings to skip lightly as if it were flying. Its bouncy step lets it even walk on water. On quiet, moonlit nights, it strolls on lakes.
37
It can freely control fire, making fiery orbs fly like will-o'-the-wisps. Just before evolution, its six tails grow hot as if on fire.
It can freely control fire, making fiery orbs fly like will-o'-the-wisps. Just before evolution, its six tails grow hot as if on fire.
38
It has long been said that each of the nine tails embody an enchanted power. A long-lived Ninetales will have fur that shines like gold.
It has long been said that each of the nine tails embody an enchanted power. A long-lived Ninetales will have fur that shines like gold.
39
Nothing can avoid falling asleep hearing a Jigglypuff's song. The sound waves of its singing voice match the brain waves of someone in a deep sleep.
Nothing can avoid falling asleep hearing a Jigglypuff's song. The sound waves of its singing voice match the brain waves of someone in a deep sleep.
40
Its fur is the ultimate in luxuriousness. Sleeping alongside a Wigglytuff is simply divine. Its body expands seemingly without end when it inhales.
Its fur is the ultimate in luxuriousness. Sleeping alongside a Wigglytuff is simply divine. Its body expands seemingly without end when it inhales.
41
While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.
While living in pitch-black caverns, their eyes gradually grew shut and deprived them of vision. They use ultrasonic waves to detect obstacles.
42
Its fangs easily puncture even thick animal hide. It loves to feast on the blood of people and Pokémon. It flits about in darkness and strikes from behind.
Its fangs easily puncture even thick animal hide. It loves to feast on the blood of people and Pokémon. It flits about in darkness and strikes from behind.
43
This Pokémon grows by absorbing moonlight. During the daytime, it buries itself in the ground, leaving only its leaves exposed to avoid detection by its enemies.
This Pokémon grows by absorbing moonlight. During the daytime, it buries itself in the ground, leaving only its leaves exposed to avoid detection by its enemies.
44
A horribly noxious honey drools from its mouth. One whiff of the honey can result in memory loss. Some fans are said to enjoy this overwhelming stink, however.
A horribly noxious honey drools from its mouth. One whiff of the honey can result in memory loss. Some fans are said to enjoy this overwhelming stink, however.
45
In seasons when it produces more pollen, the air around a Vileplume turns yellow with the powder as it walks. The pollen is highly toxic and causes paralysis.
In seasons when it produces more pollen, the air around a Vileplume turns yellow with the powder as it walks. The pollen is highly toxic and causes paralysis.
46
A Paras has parasitic tochukaso mushrooms growing on its back. They grow by drawing nutrients from the host. They are valued as a medicine for long life.
A Paras has parasitic tochukaso mushrooms growing on its back. They grow by drawing nutrients from the host. They are valued as a medicine for long life.
47
Parasect are known to infest the roots of large trees en masse and drain nutrients. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
Parasect are known to infest the roots of large trees en masse and drain nutrients. When an infested tree dies, they move onto another tree all at once.
48
Its coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body is said to have evolved for protection. Its large eyes never fail to spot even miniscule prey.
Its coat of thin, stiff hair that covers its entire body is said to have evolved for protection. Its large eyes never fail to spot even miniscule prey.
49
Venomoth are nocturnal--they only are active at night. Their favorite prey are insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
Venomoth are nocturnal--they only are active at night. Their favorite prey are insects that gather around streetlights, attracted by the light in the darkness.
50
Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple--wherever they burrow, the soil is left perfectly tilled for growing delicious crops.
Diglett are raised in most farms. The reason is simple--wherever they burrow, the soil is left perfectly tilled for growing delicious crops.
51
Because the triplets originally split from one body, they think exactly alike. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly through the ground.
Because the triplets originally split from one body, they think exactly alike. They work cooperatively to burrow endlessly through the ground.
52
Meowth withdraw their sharp claws into their paws to silently sneak about. For some reason, this Pokémon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
Meowth withdraw their sharp claws into their paws to silently sneak about. For some reason, this Pokémon loves shiny coins that glitter with light.
53
A Persian's six bold whiskers sense air movements to determine what is in its vicinity. It becomes docile if grabbed by the whiskers.

54
When its headache intensifies, it starts using strange powers. However, it has no recollection of its powers, so it always looks befuddled and bewildered.
When its headache intensifies, it starts using strange powers. However, it has no recollection of its powers, so it always looks befuddled and bewildered.
55
A Golduck is an adept swimmer. It sometimes joins competitive swimmers in training. It uses psychic powers when its forehead shimmers with light.
A Golduck is an adept swimmer. It sometimes joins competitive swimmers in training. It uses psychic powers when its forehead shimmers with light.
56
When it starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign of anger. However, since this happens instantly, there is no time to flee.
When it starts shaking and its nasal breathing turns rough, it's a sure sign of anger. However, since this happens instantly, there is no time to flee.
57
When it becomes furious, its blood circulation becomes more robust, and its muscles are made stronger. But it also becomes much less intelligent.
When it becomes furious, its blood circulation becomes more robust, and its muscles are made stronger. But it also becomes much less intelligent.
58
Its superb sense of smell ensures that this Pokémon won't forget any scent, no matter what. It uses its sense of smell to detect the emotions of others.
Its superb sense of smell ensures that this Pokémon won't forget any scent, no matter what. It uses its sense of smell to detect the emotions of others.
59
This fleet-footed Pokémon is said to run over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within its body is its source of power.
This fleet-footed Pokémon is said to run over 6,200 miles in a single day and night. The fire that blazes wildly within its body is its source of power.
60
It is possible to see this Pokémon's spiral innards right through its thin skin. However, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.
It is possible to see this Pokémon's spiral innards right through its thin skin. However, the skin is also very flexible. Even sharp fangs bounce right off it.
61
Its body surface is always wet and slick with an oily fluid. Because of this greasy covering, it can easily slip and slide out of the clutches of any enemy in battle.

62
Its highly developed muscles never grow fatigued, however much it exercises. This Pokémon can swim back and forth across the Pacific Ocean without effort.

63
A Pokémon that sleeps 18 hours a day. Observation revealed that it uses Teleport to change its location once every hour.

It is rumored that a boy with psychic abilities suddenly transformed into Kadabra while he was assisting research into extrasensory powers.

65
While it has strong psychic abilities and high intelligence, an Alakazam's muscles are very weak. It uses psychic power to move its body.

66
It continually undertakes strenuous training to master all forms of martial arts. Its strength lets it easily hoist a sumo wrestler onto its shoulders.

67
A belt is worn by a Machoke to keep its overwhelming power under control. Because it is so dangerous, no one has ever removed the belt.
A belt is worn by a Machoke to keep its overwhelming power under control. Because it is so dangerous, no one has ever removed the belt.
68
It is impossible to defend against punches and chops doled out by its four arms. Its fighting spirit flares up when it faces a tough opponent.

69

70
At night, a Weepinbell hangs on to a tree branch with its hooked rear and sleeps. If it moves around in its sleep, it may wake up to find itself on the ground.

71
The long vine extending from its head is waved about as if it were a living thing to attract prey. When an unsuspecting victim approaches, it is swallowed whole.

72
Its body is almost entirely composed of water. It ensnares its foe with its two long tentacles, then stabs with the poison stingers at their tips.

73
It lives in complex rock formations on the ocean floor and traps prey using its 80 tentacles. Its red orbs glow when it grows excited or agitated.
It lives in complex rock formations on the ocean floor and traps prey using its 80 tentacles. Its red orbs glow when it grows excited or agitated.
74
It climbs mountain paths using only the power of its arms. Because they look just like boulders lining paths, hikers may step on them without noticing.
It climbs mountain paths using only the power of its arms. Because they look just like boulders lining paths, hikers may step on them without noticing.
75
They descend from mountains by tumbling down steep slopes. They are so brutal, they smash aside obstructing trees and massive boulders with thunderous tackles.

76
It is said to live in volcanic craters on mountain peaks. Once a year, it sheds its hide and grows larger. The shed hide crumbles and returns to the soil.
It is said to live in volcanic craters on mountain peaks. Once a year, it sheds its hide and grows larger. The shed hide crumbles and returns to the soil.
77
A Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. Its legs become stronger as it stumbles and falls while trying to keep up with its parent.
A Ponyta is very weak at birth. It can barely stand up. Its legs become stronger as it stumbles and falls while trying to keep up with its parent.
78
It usually canters casually in the fields and plains. But once a Rapidash turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.
It usually canters casually in the fields and plains. But once a Rapidash turns serious, its fiery manes flare and blaze as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.
79
It catches prey by dipping its tail in water at the side of a river. But it often forgets what it is doing and spends entire days just loafing at water's edge.

Tri Attack

680
Counterfeit
Counterfeit
[6]
1
Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
Using its tough and impressive horn, the user rams into the target with no letup.
2
The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.
The user calls out its underlings to pummel the target. Critical hits land more easily.
3
The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
The user vibrates its wings to generate a damaging sound wave. It may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
4
Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.
Although this move has great power, it only works the first turn the user is in battle.
5
Fires an exploding pollen puff at enemies, or a HP-restoring one at allies.
Fires an exploding pollen puff at enemies, or a HP-restoring one at allies.
6
The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
The user drains the target's blood. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.
7
The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This lowers the target's Attack stat.
The user makes a lunge at the target, attacking with full force. This lowers the target's Attack stat.
8
The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
The user slashes at the foe by crossing its scythes or claws as if they were a pair of scissors.
9
The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.
The user attacks with a sinister beam of light. It may also confuse the target.
10
After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
After making its attack, the user rushes back to switch places with a party Pokémon in waiting.
11
The user crushes its foes by rolling over them. This attack may make the target flinch.
The user crushes its foes by rolling over them. This attack may make the target flinch.
12
The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
The user bites the target. If the target is holding a Berry, the user eats it and gains its effect.
13
The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.
The foe is attacked with powdery scales blown by wind. It may also raise all the user's stats.
14
When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.
When the user knocks out a target with this move, the user's Attack stat rises drastically.
15
While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
While resisting, the user attacks the opposing Pokémon. The targets' Sp. Atk stat is reduced.
16
The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.
The target is slashed with scythes or claws. Its power increases if it hits in succession.
17
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
Sharp spikes are shot at the target in rapid succession. They hit two to five times in a row.
18
The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
The foe is stabbed twice by a pair of stingers. It may also poison the target.
19
The target is infested and unable to flee for four to five turns.
The target is infested and unable to flee for four to five turns.
20
The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
The user calls out its underlings to shield its body, raising its Defense and Sp. Def stats.
21
The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
The user calls out its underlings to heal it. The user regains up to half of its max HP.
22
The target is covered in a powder that explodes and damages it if it uses a Fire-type move.
The target is covered in a powder that explodes and damages it if it uses a Fire-type move.
23
The user performs a beautiful dance. It boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
The user performs a beautiful dance. It boosts the user's Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.
24
The user scatters irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.
The user scatters irritating powder to draw attention to itself. Opponents aim only at the user.
25
The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.
The user ensnares the target with thin, gooey silk so it can't flee from battle.
26
Weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching in.
Weaves a sticky net around the opposing team, which lowers their Speed stats upon switching in.

Which mode would you like to play?
¿Qué modo te gustaría jugar?
Play Classic Mode
Jugar modo clásico
\C[1]Classic\C[0] is the default game mode. All of the player teams and encounters are based on the original games. Every Pokémon is still available.
\C[1]Classic\C[0] is the default game mode. All of the player teams and encounters are based on the original games. Every Pokémon is still available.
Play Remix Mode
Play Remix Mode
\C[1]Remix mode\C[0] is a special mode made by some members of the community that changes all of the trainer teams and wild encounters to showcase more Pokémon from the newer generations.
\C[1]Modo remix\C[0] es un modo especial creado por algunos miembros de la comunidad que cambia todos los equipos de entrenadores y encuentros salvajes para mostrar más Pokémon de las generaciones más nuevas.
Play Randomized Mode
Play Randomized Mode
In \C[1]Randomized mode\C[0] all of the trainers, wild encounters and items can be randomized. You'll get to customize exactly how you want everything to be randomized.
En \C[1]modo aleatorio\C[0], todos los entrenadores, encuentros salvajes y objetos pueden ser aleatorizados. Podrás personalizar exactamente cómo quieres que todo sea aleatorizado.
Play Legendary Mode
Play Legendary Mode
In \C[1]Legendary mode\C[0], every trainer Pokémon gets fused with a legendary Pokémon. You also start with an egg of every legendary Pokémon in your PC and get a legendary starter.
In \C[1]Legendary mode\C[0], every trainer Pokémon gets fused with a legendary Pokémon. You also start with an egg of every legendary Pokémon in your PC and get a legendary starter.
Play Expert Mode
Play Expert Mode
\C[1]Expert mode\C[0] mode is similar to Classic mode, but it changes all of the trainer teams to make them as challenging as possible. This is for veteran Pokémon trainers only!
El modo \C[1]experto\C[0] es similar al modo clásico, pero cambia todos los equipos de entrenadores para hacerlos lo más desafiantes posible. ¡Este es solo para entrenadores Pokémon veteranos!
